product_name: Mario BadescuCaffeine Eye Cream for Depuffing
summary: SummaryMario Badescu's Caffeine Eye Cream is a Caffeine-infused eye cream for tired under-eyes. This eye cream has a light, silky texture that slips across the skin and sinks in seamlessly. Hydrates, softens, and smooths and helps de-puff to promote more radiant looking under eyes.
details: DetailsBenefitsCaffeine-infusedPacked with skin-loving botanicals to nourish and moisturizeGlides across skin with beautiful slip and melts in effortlesslyLightweight whipped textureEncourages brighter, more youthful-looking eye areaRestores skin firmness and elasticity, minimizing the appearance of visible blood vessels and eye puffinessOil freeParaben freeFragrance freeItem 2574033How To UsePat a small amount of cream under and around the eye area using the ring finger. Follow the orbital bone from the inner corners to the outermost corners. Some may experience a feeling of warmth or tingling. Avoid direct contact with eyes. If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Pat a small amount of cream under and around the eye area using the ring finger. Follow the orbital bone from the inner corners to the outermost corners. Some may experience a feeling of warmth or tingling. Avoid direct contact with eyes. If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water.

reviews.headline: Nice moisturizer but does not de-puff under eyes as clai
reviews.comments:
Pros: a tiny amount of product goes a long way, it works well on my super-sensitive skin, moisturizes well
Cons: after a month of daily use, my opinion is that it doesn't de-puff the under eye area at all. I even tried only applying under one eye a few times just to compare results. No difference! Also the jar design is misleading, inside has a false bottom so you're not getting as much product as the outer appearance of the jar might lead you to believe. Will I use this product up? Yes, because it does moisturize nicely. Would I buy it again? No, because it doesn't de-puff at all. And that's what I really want - a product to de-puff and firm my under eye area.

reviews.headline: If you like burning eyes
reviews.comments: This makes my eyes burn, hurt and turn red. Unlike any otger of a dozen other eyes creams ive tried.

reviews.headline: Overpriced
reviews.comments: Works the same as olay but, costs more. Will be returning.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I love it, it magic, its like thoe fourth time that i buy it

reviews.headline: Amazing for My Sensitive Eyelids
reviews.comments: I have the MOST sensitive eyelids of anyone I know. Previously, I could only use Aquaphor on my eyelids. This eye cream is silky heaven for my eyes. However, I know a couple of people who say they can't use it because it burns their eyelids, which really surprised me! For me personally, it is the only eye cream that my eyelids have actually been able to stand. I cannot comment on the puffiness reduction because that is not an issue of mine.

reviews.headline: This product does what I want it to do.
reviews.comments: I am no longer a young person and this product continues to keep me from getting bags under my eyes.  I have used it for years.

reviews.headline: Light luxury
reviews.comments: This is a nice, smooth, lightweight eye cream. I have very sensitive skin and it's perfect for providing a bit of cool moisture in the morning before applying my makeup.

reviews.headline: Burning sensation
reviews.comments: At first it was great, I did see some change but after a couple of days it started to burn and sting. I stopped using it.

reviews.headline: Best eye cream ever!
reviews.comments: This is absolutely the best eye cream on the market.  If you suffer with eye puffiness, this is the eye cream for you to use.  Wouldn't use anything else!

reviews.headline: Pain!
reviews.comments: This eye cream was not gentle enough to use on my face, let alone the delicate skin around my eyes. The intense burning and stinging this caused only stopped when i started using this on my hands.

reviews.headline: My Favorite!!
reviews.comments: This eye cream is my favorite, nightly eye cream! It is lightweight and you can feel it begon working as soon as applied. The affordable price is a bonus!

reviews.headline: burning
reviews.comments: my eyes felt burning while ysing this eye cream. Notice it more when not wearing contacts. also , blurry vision.

reviews.headline: IT REALLY WORKS!!
reviews.comments: As someone who suffers from under eye puffiness, I've tried alot of other products. This particular brand works for me without breaking the bankðŸ˜‰ðŸ¥°

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: I use this every day and I love what it does to reduce puffiness under my eyes!

reviews.headline: Burnt the top layer of skin
reviews.comments: This does wake up your eyes, but it also burnt the top layer of skin next to my eye. At first it's very raw, then developed bumps from irritation, now left with a patchy dry spot and itching.

reviews.headline: I would buy against
reviews.comments: Caffeine seems to work for me I for me I got the caffeine eye patches , I saw a big difference so this why I purchased this item.,I've been using it for 5 days and I see tightness which is what I'm looking for . So I think it's good .

reviews.headline: Absolutely
reviews.comments:
Within 2 days of using the eye cream in the morning my under eye bags disappeared.
I have dry skin and it did not dry my eye area!
Great price!

reviews.headline: Nice eye cream
reviews.comments: I generally can't tell the difference between most eye creams.  This one is nice and light.

reviews.headline: i would but this again
reviews.comments: this product is one of my favorites. i love using it & have been for awhile now. i have very dark eye circles & it's helped tremendously!

reviews.headline: Very drying!
reviews.comments: I had some type of allergic reaction to using this. I've tried a lot of eye creams in the past but never this bad! Skin around my eyes was red, puffy, & flakey for a couple days after using.

values.label: A little goes a long way
Silky smooth and works awesome under concealer.

display_values: A little goes a long way
Silky smooth and works awesome under concealer.

faceoff_positive.comments: I've tried other caffeine eye creams and serums, and this one is by far my favorite. I love Mario Badescu products and couldn't wait to try this eye cream. I use it every morning and sometimes mid-day when I'm feeling tired. It's more of a cooling sensation than a tingling for me. It's very refreshing, and a little goes a long way.
faceoff_positive.headline: Wakes up my tired eyes
